Reviews.Title: Feature Packed
Reviews.Author: rezzy
Reviews.Content: This set is a bit small, but man, is it a looker. It features a  built-in HD tuner for digital OTA reception, HDMI & Component connectors for hi-def media players, as well as an SVGA hookup to perform as a computer monitor. The speakers sound a bit "tinny" as could be expected, but the volume can get up fairly loud.And hard to tell from the pics here, but its cabinet and screen have a nice looking glossy finish. The only downside is that is does have a somewhat narrow viewing range (though it has a tilting base). Otherwise, a great little unit with an excellent price tag.

Reviews.Title: Versatility for a great price.
Reviews.Author: J. Schneider
Reviews.Content: In searching for a unit that worked as both a computer monitor and TV, this came up. After reading all of the Amazon reviews, C. Hobb's review was the clincher. I received my Coby HDTV yesterday and it's everything the positive reviews said it was. It works great as a TV and computer monitor. Hook up was a breeze. It's exactly what I was looking for at a great price.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for  --- buyer beware!
Reviews.Author: jazmaan
Reviews.Content: The screen on this "TV" is highly prone to glare and ambient light reflections.  Worse than that, the viewing angle is so limited that moving your eyes off axis just a foot or two (whether up or down or side to side) will cause the picture to go negative like it was shot in infrared.  To add insult to injury, the included stand is not capable of tilting to a downward angle, so you can't place the TV higher than your eye level without getting the "negative" effect.But the real insult is that the TV will NOT respond to any other manufacturer's remote control.  If you've got a Verizon Set Top Box, there is no way to control the Coby with your Verizon remote.  None of the remote codes work.  Do a Google search on "Coby TV" and "Remote Code" and you'll learn what I wish I'd known before I bought this cheap piece of junk.  You're stuck with using the ugly little grey remote that came with the Coby and if you lose that then you're screwed.  If you have a STB, that means it takes two different remotes to turn your TV on and off and control its volume, while your STB remote changes channels.  How retro is that?So don't be penny foolish.  Cough up the extra dough and buy a better TV than this COBY.

Reviews.Title: Bad Viewing with Audio Delay
Reviews.Author: BSwine
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the kitchen and never dreamed that this TV could be so bad.  The shiny black screen reflects every window and light in the room (almost as good as a mirror).The viewing angle is just bad.  Side to side you only get about 50-60 degrees.  This would be ok if you hide this in a corner, but I have it in the center of wall.  In about 80% of my kitchen the picture is inverted or not viewable.  Even worse is the vertical viewing angle.  I have tilted the screen down as far as it will go and if you sit at the table, then the screen is not visible.Most of my problem with this TV is with the audio video alignment problems.  Not noticeable at first, but over time it started to bug me.  I finally figured out that the audio was about 1/10th behind the video.  This was not every channel, not all of the time.  It would come and go.  As I started to pay attention to this problem, I noticed that audio could be as much as a 1/4 second either before the video or behind the video.  Most noticeable on the big network's digital broadcast (they are using 1920x1080i or 720x480i).  I have other digital signal converters and dvd recorders that do not have these delay problems.This has been returned as a defective unit, but I think that Coby just used cheap electronics.  I wish I could select 0 stars for this review :-<

Reviews.Title: not my best buy, to say the least
Reviews.Author: Thomas Pope
Reviews.Content: Picture is low quality, but the reason I sent it back was that the remote only worked intermittently. That implies a low standard of quality control.

Reviews.Title: Please, save the money for something better, or get a used one from a reputable brand
Reviews.Author: J. Lin
Reviews.Content: I will return this one back tomorrow, and swallow the shipping cost. The main complaint, other than the poor picture quality (I expected that with this brand and cost), is that if you live in a rural area, and if you can only rely on antenna, you are doomed with this machine.As people use antenna may know, each channel has it's own antenna angles. That is, you switch the channel and adjust the antenna. With this TV, it only accepts pre-scanned channels. That is, it scans the whole spectrum with one antenna orientation, save the channels and done. Yes, it is convenient. But after that, you cannot do anything to it. You cannot "enter" a channel (such as 7.1) when the channel number is not previously saved. You cannot try to adjust the antenna to tune in a channel that is not previously saved first. HOW STUPID IS THAT?But if you have cable service and want to take this one, yes, you can. But for anyone in our situation, please, try something else. Our Sony is much better to allow us enter any channel number we want and it tries to tune in. Even the digital TV converter works better than this Coby TV.

Reviews.Title: Good things in small package...
Reviews.Author: A. E. Johnson "Dreamsinflight"
Reviews.Content: I needed a good quality TV for a small space and this Coby is working out fine. I have cable and my WII attached to it and have played DVDs on it as well. I am very pleased with the value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Small Digital LCD
Reviews.Author: P. Fagen
Reviews.Content: I shopped Walmart, Circuit City, and Best Buy - they had nothing close to this - a small LCD with Digital, with numerous A/V input connections. Good picture quality and sound. Very light weight. And a very good price! Only downside - it's made in China, I'd prefer to buy American.

Reviews.Title: Bad screen quality
Reviews.Author: T. Taylor
Reviews.Content: The screen quality of this TV was pretty bad for a flat screen - both from a direct point of view and particularly from a side-angle view (very bad).  In fact, the screen quality was the reason I ended up returning this TV and don't plan to purchase a Coby ever again!

Reviews.Title: Good little TV for the money
Reviews.Author: DoxieLover
Reviews.Content: I have used the Coby 15" TV for about a month and I can say that I am pleased with its features and performance.  I researched a lot of TVs and read many reviews before purchasing this brand, and knew what to expect. This TV replaced an 8-inch tube TV. The Coby was easy to set up to run on cable and easy to customize. What I like is the cable and cord attachments are on the backside so cord and cable don't jut out from the side, and the TV is wall-mountable.  We watch TV from two areas in the kitchen and purchased a wall mount that swivels and tilts, which helps maintain good viewing angles whether standing or sitting. Picture quality and sound are okay for my viewing needs in the kitchen. Yes, the picture is not the highest quality (would probably improve with an HD receiver) and the sound is a litte tinny (no problems with volume). Overall, the Coby is a good little LCD HDTV for the money.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15-inch LCD - TFTV1524
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Great little LCD HDTV especially for the price.  By far the best price I found online and at the local retail level.I checked specs. for several HDTVs before buying, including substantially more expensive name brands, and they were the same.  No, I never had the chance to do a side by side comparison so I can't speak to that.Screen:  Crisp and clear but, like most/all LCDs, still not as bright as the old cathode ray tube monsters that essentially no longer exist.Sound:  Yes they're small speakers but it sounds at least as good as my old 32" monster especially when you adjust the treble, bass, surround sound etc. to your liking.Mount:  Easy mounting using an industry standard VESA wall mount.  A table stand is also included.Use:  Straight forward on-screen menus for setup and use.In box:  TV, remote, RCA cable pair, table stand, directions (which really don't offer much but the onscreen programming is fine)Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Not for use with an antenna.
Reviews.Author: C. Hadaway
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because the switch to DTV will soon be required.  I use an OMNI directional TV antenna that I've been happy with for 3 analog TVs (concurrently).  With this new COBY TV I can only get the analog channels.  Per everything I've read, there is nothing about an antenna that makes it either hd, digital, or analog.  It's all marketing hype. The TV tuner determines whether it receives hd or not.  This Coby has a built in HTSC tuner which is supposed to turn it into HDTV.  It's not working!  I get only analog stations.

Reviews.Title: Bad picture quality
Reviews.Author: Gerald D. Rutledge
Reviews.Content: I buoght this TV for my bedroom in an RV. The cabinet for it is a little high, at the foot of the bed. The only way you can watch this TV is to be straight in front of it. If you are slightly off center, the picture looks like infra red.I could not sit or lay in bed and watch it. I then went to a store to buy one, and all of the less expensive ones that I saw had the same problem, but Coby was the worst. However, I was very pleased with amazon. I got the product sooner than I expected, it was no problem sending it back, and I received a credit right away.

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL DIGITAL TV
Reviews.Author: C. CORMIER
Reviews.Content: WHAT A QUALITY DIGITAL PICTURE, I WAS SURPRISED THAT AT SUCH A LOW PRICE THIS LCD TV WOULD HAVE SUCH A BEAUTIFUL PICTURE & SOUND. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE.CLC/HOUSTON, TX

Reviews.Title: Glamorous Deal
Reviews.Author: SeaScavenger "GuyAtTech"
Reviews.Content: For the same price as a monitor alone.... I got a tv.. connections galore and portability..Did I mention it is pretty too????

Reviews.Title: Great little TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: A. Wright
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my kitchen in preparation for the digital cutover. I'm using it with an antenna (not connected to cable).  The picture is fine for what I use the TV for (watching the news while getting ready for work).This is my first digital TV so I don't have a lot to compare it to, but I'd recommend it for a kitchen or bedroom, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: lcd tv
Reviews.Author: D. Tedesco
Reviews.Content: Nice Tv for the money. Beautiful cabinet. Picture is good far away but really bad off to the side or up close. I'd buy it again .

Reviews.Title: Great for RV
Reviews.Author: D. Landon
Reviews.Content: This TV is Great for the RV, its connects to the DVD system perfectly, the screen is nice and easy to see after adjusting the settings, it pulls less than 30 watts off the inverter, it autoscans and adds digital as well as analog stations, the digital is crystal clear. This is a must for RVers and OTA Truckers an all around TV/Monitor. I will consider Coby products in the future for my home. :)Here is the link to the manufacturers web site:[...]

Reviews.Title: Affordable and worth more than the money
Reviews.Author: H. Jenkins "Peaches and Herb"
Reviews.Content: This tv is a very good flat screen tv that has an excellent screen quality and is an extremely good price for the money.

Reviews.Title: Low Quality Digital Tuner
Reviews.Author: J. Tate
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Coby TV for the kitchen. I don't have access in the kitchen from my satellite setup so I have to use an indoor over the air antenna. The digital tuner in the Coby is very poor. I could hardly pick up any stations even though I live within a 5 - 8 mile radius of all the Memphis towers. I even used two different antennas (both with UHF/VHF) and moved the TV to different rooms. The older non HD TV with a digital tuner that the Coby was replacing worked fine. It picked up ALL the stations with the same setup. If you will be using this TV with cable or satellite I'm sure it will work well. I actually liked the TV, thought it had a good picture for such a small LCD HD TV. The picture angles are not great but I expected that. Needless to say I have sent this back to Amazon. So beware if you are purchasing this to use with an indoor antenna.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: M. Torres
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this small HD TV.  We are using it as a remote monitor for a multiple camera security system and it is providing excellent resutls.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Looks nice but poor picture
Reviews.Author: PRG4533
Reviews.Content: It was the right size for the kitchen table and a great selection of inputs, but the picture quality is so poor that I'm returning it.  The viewing angle, particularly the vertical, is very poor.  Unless you are viewing within a few degrees of center, the display is washed out or displays that "negative" LCD image.  The stand does not allow enough tilt to compensate.  The sound was quite good with separate bass and trebble controls.

Reviews.Title: I think it will be OK
Reviews.Author: JGinLA
Reviews.Content: We have a big screen and four small TV's in a cabinet and keep most of them on all day. I replaced a 13 inch TV with the Coby which is about the same size picture but wider. The Coby is on cable (non-HD).The picture is very sharp and the wavy lines that our cable system cannot get rid of are cleaned up nicely. Graphics and closed captions are easy to read from 15 feet away. I try to average out the difference in tint from one station to another and this TV took a while. Likewise, if I tried to match the contrast/brightness to the nearby TV's, it was nearly impossible. If you see haze, start over. Bad lighting, harsh lighting really looks terrible on close-ups of faces. Comparing the pavement on a sunny racetrack seen on this TV to another TV looks just like what I see when I take off my polarized sunglasses riding down the interstate.Comparing the sound on this TV to every other TV is like saying Pee Wee Herman will never beat Hulk Hogan. No, he won't. But, comparing my four SMALL TV's, the Coby is the loudest and clearest. Turn up the bass and treble as much as you like.The remote is just the right size and well-organized except the "zero" is on the left side when it should be in the middle like a telephone. The menu used to adjust the TV does not cover the screen as badly as the ViewSonic I bought a few months ago.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15 inch TV, small price big quality
Reviews.Author: Mary F. Branum "Galveston Cruiser"
Reviews.Content: Wanting a small TV for the kitchen, researched and reviewed many models prior to choosing Coby due to price and size.  Received almost immediately and was pleasantly surprised about quality of picture.  Husband laid claim immediately and took to his office, requiring me to order a second TV.  Again, arrived within a few d ays and now is properly installed in my kitchen, not to be removed.  We are very pleased with the Coby and have recently purchased a Coby DVD player to replace one lost in hurricane Ike. We definitely would purchase Coby products in the future.

Reviews.Title: colby TV
Reviews.Author: R. Suste "Razor"
Reviews.Content: the first Coby i got was defective but Amazon came through and and i sent it back with no problems. i got another one within 5days and works fine.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: mellouel
Reviews.Content: The perfect size for my bedroom, great picture, fabulous color, no problems with sound, the viewing angle, or any of the other negatives mentioned in other reviews. All in all, far better quality and performance than I would think possible at such a low price. Another plus, the usual hassle-free ordering and delivery that I always get from Amazon. I will definitely recommend this amazing little TV to friends.

Reviews.Title: nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Syd Holmes
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice little TV for the money. I needed something small for my home office and this worked out well. Good picture quality and sound. Easy operation and adjustments. The only downside is the extremely narrow viewing band. If you are not perfectly centered in front of the set, the picture quality get very poor. Just be sure you use it where you can easily adjust the set position and you will be fine.

Reviews.Title: An excellent small TV
Reviews.Author: David Fletcher
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 15" TV as a kitchen counter TV for my wife.  It took only 10 minutes to set it up and scan for the cable channels.  Picture quality is better than average, sound quality is what you'd expect from such small,light speakers.  We'll look to COBY to replace our old bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: K. Gnagey
Reviews.Content: Got these LCD HDTV/Monitor because in was a good price. Sound is ok, but for the price you can't ask for to much. Will hook up extra speakers for better sound. The LCD HDTV/Monitor has a nice gloss black finish. Had the TV for a month now and with no problems. I give it 4 stars.Good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap little TV
Reviews.Author: Cupcake
Reviews.Content: I bought this for background interest while I'm dyeing or carding in my fiber studio. I agree that it's limited in the viewing angle & the sound is pretty low and tinny, but for a $135, it's just right for my use. So far, I haven't used it for HD, just DVDS & my Roku player. If you're viewing head-on, the picture is crisp and beautifully saturated, and the sound is fine (I'd call it about medium cranked all the way up) if you don't need it too loud. If you're in a loud or white noise heavy environment (e.g., lots of fans), it might be too quiet. For an extra TV that you just want for background viewing in the kitchen, studio or office (I discovered years ago that shifting your focus from your monitor to a TV screen a few feet away will prevent/reverse eye strain), it's just right & the price is dandy.

Reviews.Title: Stellar!
Reviews.Author: k9sound
Reviews.Content: I don't think Amazon could have shipped this any faster. It was here the next day and I ordered 3-day. Nice surprise, Amazon, and a really good unit, too. I like the picture when watching TV and DVDs, it's sharp and clear, colors are fine. The menu selection is simple, straightforward and effective, easy to switch between sources and aspect ratios. The TV is small and light for carrying around and receives all the HD stations I need with a passive internal antenna. Of course, I'm right in town, otherwise I'd get an external. I also use this TV as a computer monitor for my Vista PC. It's not real sharp, but I consider that a reasonable compromise for eliminating a bulky CRT display and a massive tube TV that had a smaller screen. It compliments my 15" Macbook Pro, too, so I can have dual 15" screens when I run Final Cut Pro, putting menus and the timeline on the Coby, thus creating a small and transportable workstation. Overall, this unit is an excellent item: multifunctional, versatile and compact.

Reviews.Title: perfect present
Reviews.Author: P. Palmer
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this, it fits in the kitchen perfectly.The picture and sound are really good .I worried the price was a little cheap,but so far no prblems.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: Peter F. Herrmann
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for the kitchen, not wanting to spend alot and therefore accepting that the picture wouldn't be eye popping.  For under $150 there's nothing to match the value of this unit.  Some local programming looks a little rough, but most network shows (all antenna feeds,) look really good!  The viewing angle is a little limited, but the wall mount and viewing position can help compensate.  Although our first unit had a bad RF connector, (returning was a breeze,) the second unit arrived quickly and was fine.  I would definitely buy another one of these for CASUAL viewing. This TV does not have the picture quality of a $1000 unit, but it certainly is not bad for the money.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY W/THIS TV!
Reviews.Author: K. MALONE
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED THIS FOR MY SON AND WE LOVE IT--NOW MY HUSBAND WANTS ONE FOR OUR BEDROOM!

Reviews.Title: Great for small bedrooms or small kitchens!!
Reviews.Author: Agustin Jimenez
Reviews.Content: This is not a TV you would normally use in a huge living room, but rather use it in a small room! The picture is good and can be improved! Sound is good and clear (again, for a small room.)Overall, I'm very pleased with this product!

Reviews.Title: small wonder
Reviews.Author: Franklin A. Edwards
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I would enjoy this small LCD TV as much as I do. It has a great picture and fits perfectly in the small space I have for it.

Reviews.Title: Get a coffee can......
Reviews.Author: M. Trombley
Reviews.Content: and start talking into it.....That's what this TV sounds like.  If you can live with that then go for it.Picture was horrible.

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV1524 15-Inch Widescreen Paperweight
Reviews.Author: Shawn A. Boyd
Reviews.Content: I received this product and used it for twenty minutes before I heard a popping sound from within and it went black. It would not power back on and I think the backlight failed. This item is junk ...do not buy! Appears to be way overpriced paperweight and very cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Got me again
Reviews.Author: Suckereverytime
Reviews.Content: CobyTFTV is supposed to be a television, right?  Then where is the PICTURE?  HD is great, colors are great, audio is great...but where is the damn picture???  My set has been questionable ever since I bought it last Sept.  Picture starts, picture doesn't start.  Wait a while, it comes on.  It doesn't come on. Tap it .  It comes on  Book says turn it off and on.  Doesn't work.  Febr 26, the thing has been on since 7:30 this AM  It is now 11:26 AM  I have had 3-4 glimpses of the picture max 5 sec each time.  That is it.  Ny advuce on buyint this product:  DON'T !!!!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Good unit for the price..  Please note though, it's the type of screen where you have to be looking right at the screen to see the picture.  Any sight lines that look on angles to the screen do not get a good picture.

Reviews.Title: POOR POOR POOR SOUND OK Picture
Reviews.Author: Longhorns "Texas"
Reviews.Content: Looking for something reasonably priced for my garage.  Purchased this tv due to the price.  You get what you pay for.  The TV alone does not produce enough sound for you to hear it even when the sound is turned all the way up.  So I installed some extra speakers.  I had these on my old 9" set, although the sound was plenty on that set.  I had the volume about half max and that was too loud.  HOWEVER with these same speakers on this tv, the volume turn up all the way was not enough but had to do.  The picture quality is ok at best.  Maybe I'll learn more about the tv and hopefully not doing something right.  Of course the manual tells you nothing.  Seems they had to write it in 500 differnet languages instead on one language and left out important information in english.  Lots of improvement to say the least.

Reviews.Title: Great Value For The $$$$$
Reviews.Author: James A. Feeney
Reviews.Content: I did alot of research before buying this 15" LCD Tv and this was by far the best one for the money. it's easy to set up, great picture, great number of inputs including an HDMI. The whole viewing angle issue brought up in other reviews is really a non issue for  me. This is not the type of TV you lay on the floor and watch . This is more of the countertop or desktop variety. The sound is ok, but with all these tv's could be better. The best sound comes when you use the HDMI input. My only complaint (if any) is the quality of the remote. It seems to be on the flimsy. That aside, I would definitely reccomend this TV.

Reviews.Title: COBY TV
Reviews.Author: D. Hooper
Reviews.Content: Using it as a computer monitor, limited space but this unit fits.  Pleased with its performance, so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: LT
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat panel and I worried about set up.  It was totally easy to set up, picture quality is great.  I use it in the kitchen, so glare is not an issue.  The only thing I could say negatively is the sound is a bit tinny, but for use in the kitchen it is a great bargin!!  I would get one again.

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV1524 15 inch Widescreen LCD/HDTV Monitor with HDMI Input, Black
Reviews.Author: Lori Vattes "DisneyLover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV awhile back while searching for a small tv to put in my bathroom.  It was cheaper than the one at Wal-Mart with free shipping so I went ahead and bought it.  I am somewhat pleased at my purchase.  Like one of the reviewers says that when you look at it at certain angles it gives you sort of an x-ray appearance to the people on the screen. Also, I don't know about not being able to use any other remote control with this tv as I have set this up in my bathroom and borrowed from my comcast cable box around the corner in my bedroom.  I have to leave the coby on channel 3 and use the comcast remote control to change the channel in the bedroom.  You have to view the same channel as in the bedroom in the bathroom.  Which is okay because I can shut the tv off in my bedroom after I pick the channel I want to watch in the bathroom while bathing.

Reviews.Title: We're very satisfied
Reviews.Author: J&M;
Reviews.Content: We're very happy with the Coby 15" wide screen t.v.  For the money, it is perfect.  We use it in our bedroom, more to listen than watch while preparing for bed.  If your expectations are reasonable, you'll be very happy.  The support provided by Coby, when we were connecting to the existing cable set-up, was excellent.J&M;

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV1524 15-inch
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Hutton
Reviews.Content: The only thing I do not like about this TV is that if you do not have the TV angled in a certain position the people's heads around their hair are all back and the picture is dark.  The color is vibrant too - sometimes too vibrant and the people are very orange even if you adjust the color.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara L. Chavez
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  It has a nice, bright picture, it's very small and easy to carry around, the sound quality is just fine and the overall quality is nice.  It's a great buy for it's size.  I saw more TV's of the same size selling for twice as much.  I recommend it to anyone...for the kitchen, the office, even the bathroom.  It's a good size for the counter top and you can watch it while you are getting ready for work.  Might be a little small for the bedroom though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for the price...
Reviews.Author: B. Noll
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a college dorm. I simply couldn't have asked for anything better. For its size, its really functional and takes up little or no space. It has all the HD ports necessary to support the Xbox 360. As an added bonus, it should be very easy to take home when school is over! I Recommend this TV to anyone who needs a TV to fit in a small space!

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Kammer
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV for the price.  Good picture and acceptable sound.  Easy to set up and install.  Importantly, it IS mountable.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Jane E. Mckinney
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect TV for the job I wanted it to do.  It's mounted on the wall in front of my treadmill.  It looks good, has wonderful reception, good color, sound, etc.  The only thing is it changes the channels very slowly, not in the cards for the enthusiastic channel surfer.  The quality is there and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Sable dog "Sable girl"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv, to use as a monitor for my webtv..It serves my need very nicely and I am well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money and space!
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV in the bathroom while I put on my make up everyday, but the space was a challenge.  I looked at a lot of TV's and found this one & it's been one of my best buys ever!  It's beautiful with a big screen for the bathroom size and so thin! I also bought the bracket to hold it and it all looks great!  After six months, I'm still very pleased with my purchase!  I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Very good tv
Reviews.Author: Asbury H. Williams
Reviews.Content: We are using this 15 inch TV in our kitchen.  It has an excellent picture quality.  I had been concerned that the sound might not be so good, but I have been pleasantly surprised by the sound.  This is a quality product with a bargain price.

Reviews.Title: 68SuperSpecial
Reviews.Author: Charles Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this product out of curiosity, size and price. Coby is an execellent choice if you are looking for a T.V. in this category. I did a lot of comparison shopping before deciding on this one. It stacks up against all the big names in T.V's. It has a great picture and sound quality with easy to follow written and on screen instructions. I was so impressed I now have three Coby T.V's, a 10", 15" and a 22" which I mounted on the wall in my bedroom. I have the 15" in the master bath and the 10" in my enclosed desk in my office at work. The jury is still out on service longevity. I don't think you will be disappointed should you decide to go with Coby.

Reviews.Title: COBY T.V.
Reviews.Author: Bluesboy "Bluesboy"
Reviews.Content: Sound quality is O.K.for a 15" T.V.I had read other reviews knocking it but it is typical T.V.quality.  The picture is very good and you do need to adjust it up and down to maximize the pic quality depending on your angle of viewing. We use it while on the computer and look up at it so we tilt it downwards and the quality is fine.  I purchased a COBY DVD player as a result of my experience w/this T.V.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Performance
Reviews.Author: Joe Hudson
Reviews.Content: I purchased and received the TV a couple of months ago and found it to meet my need completely.  I wanted a HDTV to replace a portable unit I used in the bathroom when getting ready for the day.  This TV fills the bill.  I had never heard of a Coby before but read the reviews and most were very favorable, like mine.  Easy to set up and with external antenna it picks up 32 stations including all local channels and I live about 35-40 miles from any tower.  The picture is clear and bright.  I have no problems seeing the picture from any angle and am very impressed with its performance so far.  We have a mitsubishi DLP and a LG Plasma hooked to direct TV and this is as sharp and clear as either of those with no cable or satelite hookup.  You do need an external antenna and we chose the RCA ANT1450M and it works like a charm.  Without the external antenna we only picked up 12 channels.  Would strongly recommend purchasing both.  Overall it does it all for me and more than exceeds my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture for the price
Reviews.Author: C. Lea
Reviews.Content: I had to return the first shipped paying the shipping charges.  The problem was the coaxial cable connection.  The distributor was very efficient and helpful with sending a replacement.  The new product was fully functioning and has done a beautiful job.  The digital tuner has a small delay accessing a new signal which is not really a problem but surfing channels requires a bit of patience.  Overall I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Coby LCD TV
Reviews.Author: D. Noble "Doug N."
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price, I would agree with others that unless you are directly in front of the TV the picture is pretty bad.  I would recommend a mount that can swivel so you can adjust the viewing angle.  Other than the viewing angle I found that it is a great tv for the price, I especially like the remote and the inputs.

Reviews.Title: What a great little TV!
Reviews.Author: Donna "Savvy Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I never heard of Coby before, but based on the good reviews this 15-inch LCD HDTV/Monitor received, I purchased it. As other reviewers have mentioned, it is very attractive, it was very easy to set up. The base/stand is sturdy, does not slip and does not tip over. I love the fact that should my pc monitor give out, I can switch this Coby to my PC as a monitor. Good set of inputs on the Coby TV, too! I do not notice any problem viewing this TV from an angle. Since it just arrived a week ago I cannot comment on how it will function over the long term, but for now the picture and sound quality are great for the price. The remote also has all the function keys I would need. Considering the price paid, this is a great bargain!

Reviews.Title: So disappointed
Reviews.Author: D. A. Rosemore
Reviews.Content: This TV has a wonderful picture, but only if you are standing directly in front of it at the same level.  There are no other viewing angles at which a clear screen can be seen.  The tv would be a perfect bargain if you could see it at all angles in a room.  I was very disappointed

Reviews.Title: satisfied, not elated
Reviews.Author: Bob of OKC
Reviews.Content: The Coby 1524 is the right size and weight for a small study.  It got here quickly (about 5 days) and it works fine.  It is hooked up to a standard cable and gets all the channels.  I was hoping for a more brilliant picture, but it is a cheap (under $150) TV and I certainly think I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" TV
Reviews.Author: Phillip J. Kurrle "Tandeman"
Reviews.Content: Clarity is just a little fuzzy. Presets for temperature of the color blend leave skin tones too orange. Colors can be manually adjufted, so it's not that significantant of an issue.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Television
Reviews.Author: P. Crowley
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for the sleeping quarters of a boat.The picture is amazing and the quality is superb.I highly recommend this television.Coby TFTV1524 15-Inch Widescreen LCD HDTV/Monitor with HDMI Input, Black

Reviews.Title: 15" LCD/DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: R. Jefferson "Romance Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: Seller shipped very fast. I finally setup the tv in my girls' room. It's a little smaller than expected, but perfect for them (23 month old & 3 1/2 yr old). My only issue is that the screen is not clear when you look at it from various angles so I had to keep changing it to ensure my girls could see the picture from their beds.  Other than that, the price was perfect since it's for my little ones.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Quality
Reviews.Author: Robert Alan Koeneke "Kyle Brandile"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for a wall mount.  TV mounted easily and no trouble hooking it up, but TV turned out to be disappointing in many aspects:1) Picture becomes washed out and hard to see at any angle but almost straight in front  2) TV tuner picked up 3 channels and I live in a big city.  All other channels were either so marginal as to be unwatchable or didn't scan at all  3) TV screen cracked while I was trying to tighted the antenna connection - very delicate TV setI bought a slightly more expensive TV ($35 more) next go around and picture was much brighter, could be seen from wide range of angles, and suddenly I had 14 good channels instead of 3.You get what you pay for - I learned this once more.

Reviews.Title: DECENT FOR THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Freeman
Reviews.Content: Like others on this site I had never heard of the COBY brand.  But, the price was ok and I really wanted to replace my office tv and kitchen tv with flat screens because of the switch over (especially after I let my converter box coupons expire) and because they would take up less space.You need a digital indoor antenna with these televisions if not hooked up to cable, etc.Also, the remote control does not always work consistently while trying to program the thing; you may have to use the control buttons on the side.  The screen is ok but does give off a lot of glare which can be annoying if you focus on it too much.  The COBY customer service reps are not especially helpful.  Don't expect a response via email; better to call if you have questions and there will likely be a wait.Despite all this I still give it 4 stars because it is actually decent for the $$$ and the picture is nice, clear.  I have a few more channels that I did not have before. Just hope you find a decent digital antenna for it.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Bob Johnson
Reviews.Content: This HDTV was bought to replace a small screen, not DTV compatible TV, that is kept on a Screened in porch.  Other than a few minor knocks very good TV.While others have mentioned the viewing angle issues we have found that for the most part it is fine, all Flat screens have angle issues.  We have found the picture to be good even when the sun is at full strength (does not beam directly into the porch) as well as in the evening.You cannot manually select channels only auto scan, or manually delete them, which I find to be a minor annoyance also the remote leaves a bit to be desired, cheap plastic feel.For the price and size for our needs this was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Bennett
Reviews.Content: I like my new TV.  Perfect for my kitchen.  The color is fine, the sound is fine.  The only problem (if you can call this a problem) is that the remote control is very sluggish.  The TV has a very slow response to the remote.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR HD PICTURE
Reviews.Author: William L. Wensel "billymac"
Reviews.Content: GREAT HD PICTURE,NOT AS GOOD ON ANALOG VIDEO,PERFECT PICTURE IF YOU HAVE A BLU-RAY PLAYER HOOKED UP AND WATCHING A BLU RAY DISC.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY SHOPPER
Reviews.Author: SANDY
Reviews.Content: I HAVE BEEN LOOKING A LONG TIME FOR A SMALL TV FOR MY BATH ROOM.I BAUGHT ANOTHER TV FIRST BUT WAS UNHAPPY WITH THAT PURCHASE. BUT THIS TV IS PERFECT. IT WAS EASY TO CONECT AND HAS A BEAUTIFULL PICTURE.I AM FAIRLY NEW TO ORDERING ON LINE BUT AMAZON MADE IT EASY AND WAS DELIVERED IN 2 DAYS.

Reviews.Title: coby 15-inch lcd review
Reviews.Author: Eric R. Salazar
Reviews.Content: Sleek, black and easy to use and handle. Nice quality picture and so much affordable. Nice find!

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Irvin Hilts
Reviews.Content: This ia a great little TV for the money. The picture is clear, sound is not bad, overall, I would say it is a good choice for the money.

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV1524 15-Inch Widescreen LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dionis Aybar
Reviews.Content: This tv looks dark from every angle. You have to be directly in front of it to see it good. Don't buy it. Save a little more money and get something better.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: B. Perry
Reviews.Content: This TV does not work with universal remotes.In 2009 that is totally ridiculous.You will be better off buying another brand.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Jessica Fox
Reviews.Content: This little TV is adequate for the kitchen.  I'm used to HDTV picture quality in the living room and it's clear that there is no comparison but I still like my little TV.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Dicey
Reviews.Content: Was looking TV with no special features for the kitchen and the Coby fit the bill.  It was cheap and it works.

Reviews.Title: won't buy again
Reviews.Author: richard Weible
Reviews.Content: Picture was not of good quality, could not see picture unless directly in front of it, and cable connection fell off the tv after limited use.

Reviews.Title: Great for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Howard D. Pelton "Bad Dad"
Reviews.Content: Been using this TV for many years with no problems , good picture for the price, have it mounted on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Herm
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife so she can watch her favorite shows while enjoying the spa on the side of our house in the evening.  We even have a long cable attached so she can get our Direct TV channels.  The TV  has a great picture, good sound and is perfect for what we are using it for.  The connections are very easy to use and we bring it in from outside when not in use.The price was right too.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Guitar Repair "DCSE"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a custom Kitchen install and it went dead in 18 months, Total garbage,  Had to uninstal it and replaced it with a Samsung

Reviews.Title: Coby 15 inch tv
Reviews.Author: P. McDowell
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv in early 2010 and it was not used a lot, but it is toast after 28 months.  Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: SMALL TV
Reviews.Author: SKEEZIX
Reviews.Content: tHE TV WORKS WELL AND IS THE CORRECT SIZE FOR ANY SMALL ROOM. mY NEGATIVE COMMENT IS THAT DURING START-UP,THERE IS NO INDICATION ,SUCH AS SOUND OR LIGHT ,TO TELL THE USER THE TV IS ON. SIMILARLY, THERE IS NO QUICK RESPONSE TO LET THE USER KNOW THE TV IS SHUT OFF. WHEN YOU PRESS THE OFF BUTTON,THE TV CONTINUES WORKING FOR A FEW SECONDS BEFORE A NOTICE COMES ON THE SCREEN TO LET YOU KNOW IT IS TURNING OFF. NEVERTHELESS, DUE TO THE SCARCITY OF TV'S OF THIS SIZE, I WOULD BUY ANOTHER ONE.

Reviews.Title: So So
Reviews.Author: Can't Believe It
Reviews.Content: It was reasonable in price. The picture was fair.  The sound was terrible, but so is my $900 Panasonic. The most annoying thing was that you had to aim the remote directly at the TV and be within 5 feet for it to work. There were very few ways you could change the piture size and shape.  For watching baseball in bed if you had it with the whole picture shown the score was so small you couldn't read it, but if you increased the picture size, then only half the score in the upper left hand corner would be on the screen.  It served its purpose, at a cheap price, for a year, but I decided to get something bigger and 1080p. This one will go into the spare bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Not for use over the air. Very poor tuner sensitivity.
Reviews.Author: Pleiades "7sisters"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set to us on our sail boat. The tuner in the set is slow to respond and worse yet it has very poor sensitivity. I have compaired to a $49.00 digital conversion box. The box picks up more station and responds much faster. The processor in tis set is very slow. Don't waste your money

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised
Reviews.Author: KP in Colorado
Reviews.Content: After reading all these reviews, I decided to purchase this set locally, thinking that I knew what to expect and that it would serve my purpose.  If not, it would be easy to return to the local retailer.  Took it home, set it up (which was easy even for a non-techy like me) and practically fell over I was so surprised!  The picture quality is sharp, the color is great and I'm not having trouble viewing it from anywhere in my kitchen. It is connected to cable. Although the sound quality is not perfect, it is perfectly acceptable with volume to spare.  I have to wonder if Coby has a quality control problem resulting in some sets being good and some not because I'm really happy with mine!

Reviews.Title: Good little tv
Reviews.Author: Carrie B. Wiseman
Reviews.Content: Put this tv in my kitchen, wish I would have spent the $10 extra dollars and got the 20" one. This tv is very small. Does a great job, no complains with it just hard to see. It's a good little tv tho, does the job.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Rachel L Nislick
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the corner of my kitchen. It is super lightweight, looks great in the kitchen, and does the trick. I like to watch the news and sports while I'm cleaning up. We got an HD box attached to this TV and the picture is super. Sound is so-so, but seriously - do you need amazing sound in the kitchen? That's what you have your family room TV for. Sound is a bit muffled but is completely fine for football and the news. Can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Gail Thayer "rubysue"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my kitchen counter and absolutely love it!! The picture and sound are awesome. Only thing is you can't program a universal remote to go with Directv but not a big deal at all.

Reviews.Title: Portable Flatscreen HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dwranny "Dwranny"
Reviews.Content: This item had very few controls and the sound was not as good as I had expected. However, it was good for counter/tabletop viewing or gameplay device. The screen was "decent" for viewing within 5-15 feet of the screen. Not recommended as a bedroom TV-not big enough. Otherwise, it was acceptable and affordable for lite to moderate use.

Reviews.Title: Nice 4 the price
Reviews.Author: Bonnie C. Crone "Bonnie"
Reviews.Content: Great picture! The only problem I found is the remote. You have to be on top of the TV to use it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty..yes
Reviews.Author: Snoopy/Ct.
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and sound.  Light weight easy portability that was good for my use.  I purchssed for use when I'm on deck.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" TV
Reviews.Author: Kathy S.
Reviews.Content: The looks and the portability of the tv are fine, but I am not happy with the volume, which needs to be turned to a very high setting to hear it.  I also am not happy with the picture distortion when looking at the screen at a different angle.  It is my first flat screen TV, so I did not realize that would happen.

Reviews.Title: Colby 15inch widescreen
Reviews.Author: RaeHighFrequency-6012
Reviews.Content: Colby 15 inch TV makes a good appearance.  Very hard to adjust the color and tint.  Each time you changed the channel the color and tint on the screen had to be adjusted.  The size was very nice for a kitchen or bedroom. Finally, returned it.

Reviews.Title: Looking for cheap but decent?
Reviews.Author: M. Curtis
Reviews.Content: First, you must make major adjustments to the picture...starting with lowering the color level significantly.  Once you get it set for "reality" it's really not bad for the price.  One thing that I find irritating is that the HDMI input fails after you turn off the monitor.  So, you have to switch to another input, then back to HDMI.  Strange.  But overall, this is a decent monitor, and for the price hard to beat!

Reviews.Title: dont buy this if you can afford better!
Reviews.Author: Diane L. Lewis "Diane Lewis Fan"
Reviews.Content: The Coby TFTV was cute, easy to set up and fit well in my bedroom; however the sound quality was less than acceptable and skipped words, etc. The picture was fuzzy but I could've handled that if the sound worked better. I ended up with a Sony... $100 more but well worth it.

Reviews.Title: TV picture lacking quality
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Conklin
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the contrast of the TV picture.  I can not get a good quality picture no matter how hard I try to adjust it. I bought the unit when it was on sale.  The price was good.  However, I would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Smitty
Reviews.Content: I spent a great deal of time trying to adjust the picture settings to get a decent picture but nothing worked.  If the scene is nighttime or a dark setting you can't see anything.  Very disappointed in the picture quality.  I'm returning this tv.

Reviews.Title: picture was extremely distorted
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: The picture was very distorted.....I must have got a bad apple......it was ok for several minutes...then it totally went to negative images....  And....warning....if you have dish network.....there are no codes compatable to program this tv to the remote!!!!!  I will order another TV from Amazon but not a Coby.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and takes allot of vibration.
Reviews.Author: H. T. Shelly "seawolf66"
Reviews.Content: Bought to replace a hard mounted TV on our boat. Used an articulating arm bracket to mount it and clamped wires to bracket. Takes some pounding when we are underway, but works like a charm and gives us a great picture with a marine antenna. Sound is fine inside the boat, not sure how it would be in a large room.

Reviews.Title: Good when they work
Reviews.Author: Jane Doe
Reviews.Content: The first one we got we had to return because we couldn't get all the channels.  The next one we could.  Then we ordered another TV, but again we couldn't get all the channels.  We sent it back.  The one we kept is fine, but obviously their quality control is bad.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey S. Baker "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for our truck camper. For the money I was impressed with the picture. It works great for us.

Reviews.Title: COBY 15 inch V
Reviews.Author: pianogirl
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with my COBY 15 inch TV.  I have had it about 6 weeks and it is giving me great service and pleasure. Color is excellent and so is the sound. Before purchasing this one, I ordered the wrong size by mistake.  Amazon allowed me to return it and order the correct size.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: M. Branum "Islander by Choice"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for kitchen; however, hubby liked it so much I gave to him for his office. Have ordered another for my kitchen.  Very easy to set up.  Good value for the money

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the Coby 15 inch TV set
Reviews.Author: Laurence F. Fryling
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this 15 inch Coby TV set.  The picture and sound are very good.  The picture becomes a bit faded when you stand over the TV set and look down at it.  It would be nice if  the screen were mounted on a stand that would allow you to tilt the screen back a bit for certain situations such as when the set is used on a countertop in a bathroom or kitchen location where limited space conditions might require that you look down at the set.We are very happy with this set and would highly recommend it to others.We are very pleased with all of our dealings with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV for small spaces
Reviews.Author: L. Donohoe "Red Rider"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mother's kitchen corner, for the DTV cutover. It works great running on an outdoor antenna in Des Moines, IA. Picture quality is very good. The light weight makes it work as a portable that can be moved to other rooms if they have an antenna lead. Completely satisfied with the set, especially for $150.

Reviews.Title: 15" COBY HDTV
Reviews.Author: Janet M. Foley "termite"
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV a lot, bought it for my bedroom. I also have a 10" in my kitchen.They are so compact, the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" Widescreen TV
Reviews.Author: Rena C. Norris
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  No problems and I got it at a GREAT price.  Just the right size for my kitchen counter

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV for the price!
Reviews.Author: soren121
Reviews.Content: I received my Coby HDTV yesterday night, and I've have been very satified with my purchase. Delivery was swift, and the TV was in perfect condition. To help you, here's some pros and cons:Pros:  * Supports all common video connections (Coax, RCA composite, S-Video, RCA component, HDMI, and VGA)  * Excellent picture quality  * Good horizontal viewing angles  * Very elegant glossy-black cabinet  * Surprisingly lightweightCons:  * Channels must be found during auto-scan  * Vertical viewing angles aren't so good  * Made of cheap-feeling plastic  * Dark colors on TV shows are grainyAlthough it has some caveats, this is an excellent HDTV for the price, and I would probably recommend it to anyone looking for a small HDTV.--EDIT--Today I decided to try and use my Coby as a second monitor for my computer. Works really well, actually. I wouldn't want to use it as my primary monitor, because it's not quite as bright or sharp as my 19" Samsung monitor. But for a second monitor, it works perfectly for what I need. :)This TV isn't exactly optimized for use as a monitor, so after a bit of trial-and-error, I've found that these are, in my opinion, the best picture settings to use. Go into the menu and change the Picture settings to the following:Picture Mode: PersonalContrast: 65Brightness: 65Sharpness: 12Color Temp.: NormalI've been testing this over HDMI, if it makes a difference. My main monitor is using the one and only DVI-VGA adapter I have, so I have to use the DVI-HDMI adapter for this. VGA might look better, who knows.

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Ms. Margaret J. Tajc
Reviews.Content: Delivery was swift, TV was all that I hoped for.  I am a satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Colby  TFTV1524 -15 inch HDMITV
Reviews.Author: Retired Papa
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased the the Colby 10.5 inch set and found it to be an excellent value.  When we needed another small set for an office type application, I thought of Colby and the  price and size were right.We were very satisfied with the purchase and delivery process.  The TV is as good as we expected.  Being in a weak signal area, we experience some signal break-up, not unlike our main TV.  We are very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" LCD
Reviews.Author: A. Miller
Reviews.Content: Price is great. Used it for a bathroom wall mount application. Easy to work with. Picture quality a little disappointing but price/value relationship well within expectations. Would buy another if I had an application need.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my Wife and wall mounted it in kitchen. It is a great little TV. We where worried when we saw it was the glossy type screen, thinking it may have glare, but when the unit is on I don't notice any glare or reflections.

Reviews.Title: Coax cable input was loose
Reviews.Author: Tim Ryan
Reviews.Content: When we got this unit we found that the coax cable input was loose and did not accept a signal so we had to return for repair

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: J. R. Teagarden
Reviews.Content: We purchased this television to take camping. My 19-year-old son has been using it to play games on his X-Box. He raves about the clarity. The price, $139.99, can't be beat! It's a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: J. Mulcahy
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to install in my conversion van.  It works great for the application and was the right price.  I'm very pleased with the TV, the viewing angle from right to left is pretty good.  The veiwing angle from top to bottom could be a little better, but I installed the TV on a bracket to be able to tip the tv angle down a bit and that problem was solved. The volume on the tv doesn't get that loud, but it works.  Overall I would say if you're looking for a cheap small tv, this one works good.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Socrates Quansah "socr"
Reviews.Content: came faster than i expected. i like it. dissapointed that it does not have an inbuilt antenna though

Reviews.Title: Gotta Get this great TV!
Reviews.Author: Kay "this tv rocks"
Reviews.Content: I had read all the reviews and did my homework to buy a 15 in. tv for my kitchen. The stores are all sold out so I checked out amazon.  I found the COBY and comparing reviews with others,  I purchased it.  I absolutely love it and the picture and sound is awesome and it looks fantastic.  I just purchased another one for my mom because she liked mine and wanted to get the great deal.  We have our cable hooked to it and the picture is crystal.. Great job Coby!  You can't beat the price either.  I like to write reviews on things I purchase whether it be good or bad and this is a super find.  I'm very pleased.  ...

Reviews.Title: Coby 15-Inch TV
Reviews.Author: H. R. Wagner
Reviews.Content: Coby TFTV1524 15-Inch Widescreen LCD HDTV/Monitor with HDMI Input, Black  I am very pleased that I decided to purchase this item for my kitchen. At first I was not sure because I was not familiar with the Coby name but I decided to give it a try. I am very satisfied with my product purchase because this TV has an excellant picture, easy to set up and program, small enough for my kitchen, with a picture size just right, and a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Good for desk top
Reviews.Author: Shopping Granny
Reviews.Content: Size did matter for the space we had available, and it is near impossible to find a 15" tv, so this was our chose.  It fits great on our computer desk, but the picture quality just isn't there.  Tried to adjust color but it didn't change, and it is not a sharp picture.  As we watch it only while at computer (home), it will serve our purpose.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Price= Cheap Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Henry G. Bean "Sheila"
Reviews.Content: My tv was purchased for my kitchen.  It is rarely used and is now 5 months old.  The sound fades in and out and the picutre quality on this TV is just horrible.  I will never buy a electronic purchase online in the future.Cheap isn't always better and this is the case on this tv!!!

Reviews.Title: Defective when received
Reviews.Author: buff
Reviews.Content: I received my Colby TFTV1524 2 days after ordered, as promised by Amazon.  Everything was new and in order.  Upon powering up the unit it would not respond to any input from either the remote or the buttons on the unit.  I called Colby customer service and was able to speak to a customer service agent in less than 10 minutes.  After hearing my explanation and asking a few questions the agent recommended I return the unit to Amazon.  I won't be ordering another as I now lack confidence in this product and this brand.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It
Reviews.Author: Buzzy
Reviews.Content: Keep away from this purchase.  Poorly made!  The fit to cable broke while trying to install.

Reviews.Title: Coby Flat Screen TV
Reviews.Author: Renee Fong
Reviews.Content: It was a great portable flat screen TV perfect for our trailer for camping and our sons room when at home.  At $109.99 it was a deal.  I gave it a 1 star rating because it had a gray horizontal line that traveled from the top of the screen to the bottom therefore being unusable.  I don't know if this was a defect caused by transit as it wasn't packaged very well and the box was heavily damaged upon arrival, or if it was a product defect.  Either way we returned the TV and because they were completely out of stock were not able to get a replacement.Therefore we will never know if the problem was specific to the TV/brand, or some other reason.  Coby TFTV1524 15-Inch Widescreen TFT LCD HDTV/Monitor with HDMI Input (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Julie Scott
Reviews.Content: For a small flat screen LCD and for the price and quick shipping it is a great product. I recommend it for a bedroom or kitchen. Hope people will enjoy as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: cody 15 inch widescreen lcd hdtv/monitor
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Sherman
Reviews.Content: i have always wanted a hi-def tv. i enjoy it very much. it was a very good invest-ment for me.

Reviews.Title: Robert
Reviews.Author: Mr. Clausell Huff "Mr Huff"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE A SMALL PLACE TO PUT MY NEW TV IN MY ROOM AND THIS WAS A GOOD PRODUCT FOR THAT PLACE.

15-Inch TFT LCD color display with dual ATSC/NTSC tuners for Digital and Standard TV broadcast reception.

Digital comb filter and noise reduction
V-chip parental control, Closed- Caption, and Electronic Program Guide support , Multi-language on-screen display,  wall-mountable design
AV input jacks for use with media players, DVR/VCRs, video games, and more
ProductInfo.Name: Coby TFTV1524 15-Inch Widescreen TFT LCD HDTV/Monitor with HDMI Input (Black)
